sourcesContent:

<div class="ekart--product-container">
  <div class="ekart--product--item" *ngFor="let p of products">
    <div class="ekart-wishlist-sale-container">
      <div class="ekart--add--to--wishlist">
        <i class="fa fa-heart-o" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      </div>
      <div class="ekart-on-sale-tag" *ngIf="p.discountPrice">
        {{ (100 - (p.discountPrice / p.price) * 100).toFixed(0) + "% OFF" }}
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="ekart--product--image">
      <img [src]="p.imageURL" class="ekart--product--image" />
    </div>
    <div class="ekart--add--to--price">{{ "$" + p.price }}</div>
    <div class="ekart--product--name">{{ p.name }}</div>
    <div class="ekart--product--category">
      {{ p.gender }} . {{ p.category }} . {{ p.brand }}
    </div>
    <div class="ekart--product--available-colors">
      {{ p.color.length }} Colors Available . Best Seller
    </div>
    <div
      class="ekart--product--in--stock"
      [ngStyle]="{
        fontWeight: 'bold',
        color: p.is_in_inventory ? 'green' : 'red'
      }"
    >
      {{
        p.is_in_inventory ? "Available in Stocks" : "Not available right now"
      }}
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
